entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
